lead_paragraph: The way the government of Bahrain would react to an uprising became clear when security forces rounded up health workers who treated injured protesters.

headline.main: A Quickly Stifled Attempt to Ease Suffering in Bahrain

snippet: The way the government of Bahrain would react to an uprising became clear when security forces rounded up health workers who treated injured protesters.
